description:
Based in Pasco, Washington, and serving clients throughout the Tri-Cities area, including Kennewick and Richland, the attorneys at the law firm of Kuffel, Hultgrenn, Klashke, Shea & Ellerd, LLP, provide quality representation in the following areas:

  • Business law
  • Real Estate law
  • Family law
  • Estate planning
  • Personal injury
  • Civil litigation
  • Criminal defense
  • Probate
  • Bankruptcy
  • Municipal law

Our law firm is set apart by our attorneys' diverse collective legal background. Each lawyer in our firm maintains a dedicated focus on a specific area of law, allowing us to analyze our clients' legal problems from multiple perspectives and recommend comprehensive solutions that consider all potential outcomes.

Our firm was established on the principles of outstanding client service and an unwavering commitment to obtaining the best possible result in every case. From protecting our clients' interests in family law proceedings to obtaining fair compensation in complex personal injury claims, you can rely on us to pursue every available option in an effort to secure a favorable outcome on your behalf.

Contact Kuffel, Hultgrenn, Klashke, Shea & Ellerd, LLP, to discuss your legal issue with an attorney. Our office is conveniently located next to the Red Lion in Pasco. We are available during our regular business hours of 8 a.m. to 5 p.m., Monday through Friday. Our office is closed from noon to 1 p.m. daily.
